activeDeck.title: Shifting Allegiances
activeDeck.effect: Move 1 influence from each courtier in a coterie to one courtier in that coterie

activeDeck.title: Commercial Ties
activeDeck.effect: Use this card in place of controlling one Commerce courtier when completing a petition this turn

activeDeck.title: Noble Privilege
activeDeck.effect: Place 2 neutral influence markers on any courtier. Neutral markers block spaces but don't grant control

activeDeck.title: Scandal
activeDeck.effect: Choose a player. Remove influence from one courtier equal to that player's exposure level

activeDeck.title: Royal Favor
activeDeck.effect: Place 2 influence on each courtier in the Noble coterie where you have at least 1 influence

activeDeck.title: Court Intrigue
activeDeck.effect: Remove up to 3 opponent influence markers from any single courtier

activeDeck.title: Information Network
activeDeck.effect: Look at top 5 cards of power deck; draw 1, shuffle rest back

activeDeck.title: Bribery
activeDeck.effect: Pay 2 gold: Remove 2 opponent influence from a courtier. Pay 4 gold: Remove 4 instead

activeDeck.title: Defensive Pact
activeDeck.effect: Until your next turn, opponents must pay 1 extra gold to target courtiers you control with power cards

activeDeck.title: Backroom Deal
activeDeck.effect: Swap up to 3 of your influence with opponent's on one courtier

activeDeck.title: Diplomatic Maneuver
activeDeck.effect: Move up to 2 of your influence markers between courtiers in the same coterie

activeDeck.title: Maritime Connections
activeDeck.effect: Use this card in place of controlling one Maritime courtier when completing a petition this turn

activeDeck.title: Academic Insight
activeDeck.effect: Use this card in place of controlling one Academic courtier when completing a petition this turn

activeDeck.title: Palace Purge
activeDeck.effect: Remove 2 influence from EACH courtier in one coterie

activeDeck.title: Coup
activeDeck.effect: Take control of one courtier by replacing all opponent influence there with yours. Maximum 5 influence replaced

activeDeck.title: Court Whispers
activeDeck.effect: Look at another player's hand. They must discard two cards of your choice

activeDeck.title: Redistribution
activeDeck.effect: Move up to 4 influence (any players') from one courtier, distributing them to other courtiers in the same coterie

activeDeck.title: Counterclaim
activeDeck.effect: Reaction: Play when an opponent places 3+ influence on a courtier. Immediately place 2 of your influence there

activeDeck.title: Sabotage
activeDeck.effect: Remove up to 2 influence from each of up to 3 different courtiers controlled by opponents

activeDeck.title: Cultural Patronage
activeDeck.effect: Use this card in place of controlling one Criminal courtier when completing a petition this turn

activeDeck.title: Strategic Repositioning
activeDeck.effect: Move up to 2 influence markers (any players') to empty spaces on other courtiers

activeDeck.title: Divide and Conquer
activeDeck.effect: Split all influence on one courtier evenly among all courtiers in that coterie. Remainder stays

activeDeck.title: Energetic Campaign
activeDeck.effect: Place influence on two different courtiers this turn instead of one

activeDeck.title: Sudden Betrayal
activeDeck.effect: Remove all YOUR influence from one courtier; remove equal amount of opponent influence from same courtier

activeDeck.title: Loyal Retainers
activeDeck.effect: Choose a courtier you control; opponent removal cards cost +2 to target it until your next turn

activeDeck.title: Blackmail
activeDeck.effect: Remove influence from one courtier equal to half target player's gold (round up)

activeDeck.title: Military Backing
activeDeck.effect: Use this card in place of controlling one Military courtier when completing a petition this turn

activeDeck.title: Consolidate Power
activeDeck.effect: Move all your influence from multiple courtiers to one courtier

discardPile.title: Rapid Expansion
discardPile.effect: Place 1 influence on up to 3 different courtiers
